title: (x) Scandia? anybody have any ideas what this little beauty is? - Fedra Sans Display Black {Hanno}
content:
Hello I just found this!  
Can any one tell me what it is and think of similar faces?  
Does this feel right?

Mr B  
x

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941im_/http:/typophile.com/files/skandia2_4269.jpg)
author: Mr Brown

comments.content:
There are probably a number of humanist sans faces with Black or Ultra weights. It's rather hard to see the details of this sample, but [Freight Sans Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941/http:/www.fontshop.com/fonts/singles/garagefonts/freight_sans_pro_black_ot/?&sample_text=Skandia&update=0) looks pretty close.

- Mike Yanega

Another similar font (at least for these letters) is [Agenda Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/fontbureau/agenda/?testdrive=custom%3D37994%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DSkandia%26size%3D36%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3DFFFFFF%26w%3D600%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26dock%3Dfalse%26seed%3D25) from Font Bureau.

- Mike Yanega

Cheers Bow, sorry about the lack of detail  
but the numbers on the side are a help?

Not 100% on freight it needs to be a bit heavier, don't you think?

Mr B

Another is [Alrights Sans Ultra](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/okay-type/alright-sans/?testdrive=custom%3D37994%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DSkandia%26size%3D36%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3DFFFFFF%26w%3D600%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26dock%3Dfalse%26seed%3D30).

I think that's a good start, but you can find more by searching on 'humanist sans-serif' and looking for families with a large number of weights.

- Mike Yanega

You know, I did not assume that the numbers were the same font. I have only been looking for the Skandia letters. They may be the same font, but if you want the numbers, that's what you should ask for.

- Mike Yanega

Agenda is getting there, cheers.  
But the bottom of the lowercase 'a' is not quite right  
and the numbers...

Cheers for your help though

Mr B

You could have a point the numbers.  
I did not mean to offend

No offense taken. I only mean that it helps us to know what you are trying to match. In this case it's quite possible the numbers are a different font.

- Mike Yanega

Looking for the numbers, I think [Baltar](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/larabie/baltar/?testdrive=custom%3D37994%26src%3Dcustom%26text%3DSkandia45%26size%3D36%26fg%3D000000%26bg%3DFFFFFF%26w%3D720%26goodies%3Dfit%252Cot.liga%26dock%3Dfalse%26seed%3D22) numerals could be fixed easily to look like these. Just fill in the 4 and cut a vertical opening in it.

- Mike Yanega

I'm VERY sure this is [Fedra Sans Display Black](http://web.archive.org/web/20100223015941/http:/www.typotheque.com/fonts/fedra_sans_display_2) (with ia-ligature) and Fedra Sans Display Condensed Black for the numbers...

- Hanno

I'd say Hanno's got it.

- Mike Y.
